base.name: Neill Holloman
base.title: Customer Service Professional
base.summary: Disciplined and analytical professional with over 15 years of experience in retail, grocery, logistics, and e-commerce. Known for delivering dependable, high-quality service and maintaining strong attention to detail in fast-paced environments. Recognized for taking initiative to identify problems, improve workflows, and support both customers and coworkers with empathy and reliability. Experienced in handling complex operational tasks while maintaining accuracy, safety, and efficiency. Guided by a simple principle: satisfy and delight. I take pride in creating positive experiences, solving challenges, and upholding standards that reflect integrity and care in every role.

experience.summary: Provide reliable and detail-oriented support in Amazon’s fast-paced logistics environment. Recognized for improving safety processes, optimizing hazardous material handling, and promoting compliance across workflows. Consistently ensure accuracy in package induction and delivery readiness through proactive communication and teamwork.
responsibilities: Operate ADTA Conveyor systems including Induct, Unload, Pusher, Diverter, Straightener, and Stow functions to maintain throughput efficiency.
Reorganized the Hazmat cage by categorizing materials such as Corrosive, Flammable, Environmental Hazard, Food-Grade Waste, and E-Waste to streamline operations.
Conducted research on EPA classifications to improve identification and handling of hazardous materials.
Trained an associate in Hazmat procedures, ensuring knowledge transfer and operational consistency.
Performed deep dives into problem packages to ensure proper processing and prevent customer delays.
Served as Safety Champion and active member of the Associate Safety Committee to promote safety culture and compliance.
Conducted regular WHS safety walks and submitted hazard observations through Dragonfly and VOA platforms.

experience.summary: Supported retail operations by efficiently organizing, tagging, and replenishing inventory to ensure timely merchandise flow. Maintained compliance with safety and loss prevention standards while contributing to a clean, well-structured stockroom.
responsibilities: Unloaded inbound freight and sorted merchandise for efficient processing and placement.
Applied security tags to high-theft merchandise, supporting store-wide loss prevention.
Organized stockroom areas to maintain accessibility and compliance with safety standards.
Prepared work-in-progress carts to expedite merchandise flow to the sales floor.
Assisted sales teams by replenishing floor inventory and maintaining presentation quality.
Maintained a clean and organized backroom to reduce risk and improve productivity.

experience.summary: Delivered engaging demonstrations that drove customer interest and sales growth for multiple brands at Costco. Known for strong communication skills, product expertise, and maintaining compliance with company and health standards.
responsibilities: Conducted product demonstrations that consistently achieved daily sales targets.
Delivered engaging customer experiences through professional communication and brand representation.
Educated customers on product features, benefits, and promotions to support purchasing decisions.
Adapted quickly to different product categories and maintained full compliance with health regulations.
Ensured demo stations remained clean, stocked, and in accordance with Costco operational policies.

experience.summary: Maintained pricing accuracy and inventory integrity across store operations. Collaborated with corporate and IT teams to resolve scanning issues, reduce pricing errors, and ensure compliance with company standards.
responsibilities: Troubleshot and resolved Electronic Sales Label (ESL) issues by coordinating with corporate technical teams.
Audited 1,000–2,000 pricing scans monthly to ensure compliance and accuracy.
Managed grocery ordering during manager absences to maintain proper stock levels.
Implemented markdown and pricing strategies to improve sales and reduce waste.
Identified product discrepancies and corrected pricing errors to protect revenue integrity.

experience.summary: Consistently ranked among top performers in customer satisfaction and sales. Excelled in handling transactions efficiently while building trust and rapport with diverse customers in a high-volume environment.
responsibilities: Achieved #2 ranking in the Pacific Region for customer satisfaction through exceptional service delivery.
Sold 3–4 credit cards monthly through strong communication and persuasive selling skills.
Operated both self-checkout and traditional registers while resolving technical and transaction issues.
Handled returns, exchanges, and payments with precision and professionalism.
Maintained a welcoming and efficient checkout environment that improved customer flow.

experience.summary: Delivered high-quality beverages and friendly service while supporting smooth daily operations. Recognized for teamwork, accuracy under pressure, and maintaining cleanliness and consistency throughout shifts.
responsibilities: Prepared and served beverages and food according to company standards.
Handled cash register operations, balancing transactions with accuracy and speed.
Ensured compliance with food safety and sanitation protocols at all times.
Supported teammates during peak hours to maintain customer satisfaction.
Restocked supplies and maintained a clean, efficient workstation.

experience.summary: Supported warehouse operations by safely handling and restocking inventory. Maintained strong attention to accuracy, organization, and compliance with safety procedures during overnight shifts.
responsibilities: Received and checked inventory for accuracy and damage.
Operated electric pallet jacks and reach forklifts to transport goods safely.
Assisted with verifying inbound shipments using handheld scanners.
Maintained clean and organized aisles to ensure readiness for morning operations.
Adhered to warehouse safety procedures and equipment handling standards.

experience.summary: Provided efficient checkout service and assisted customers with product inquiries. Demonstrated professionalism, reliability, and strong attention to detail in all store operations.
responsibilities: Handled customer transactions quickly and accurately at the register.
Restocked grocery and household sections to maintain availability.
Resolved product-related inquiries and guided customers to appropriate departments.
Maintained clean and organized aisles to support customer experience.

experience.summary: Ensured store-wide pricing accuracy, compliance, and technical issue resolution. Provided reliable communication between store operations and corporate support to maintain data integrity and smooth execution.
responsibilities: Used ServiceNow for issue tracking and troubleshooting store equipment and systems.
Performed BIZERBA scale resets and PLU data management to maintain accuracy.
Coordinated with corporate pricing teams to resolve label discrepancies.
Audited product pricing and signage to meet compliance requirements.
Trained and supported team members in scanning and labeling processes.

experience.summary: Maintained excellent product quality, stock rotation, and store presentation. Built positive relationships with customers through friendly, knowledgeable service in a fast-paced environment.
responsibilities: Stocked and rotated products in Dairy, Frozen, and Bulk departments.
Ensured compliance with food safety and sanitation regulations.
Provided product recommendations and assisted customers with special orders.
Collaborated across departments to meet stocking and display goals.

experience.summary: Worked collaboratively in a fast-paced kitchen to deliver consistent quality and service. Supported teammates and upheld high food safety standards.
responsibilities: Prepared menu items to company standards and served orders accurately.
Operated grill, fryer, and line stations during peak hours.
Maintained cleanliness and safety across kitchen and dining areas.

experience.summary: Maintained store accessibility and safety by efficiently retrieving and organizing shopping carts. Provided courteous assistance to customers as needed.
responsibilities: Retrieved and organized carts using cart mules for customer availability.
Assisted customers with loading and transport of heavy items.
Kept parking and entry areas clear and safe from obstructions.

experience.company: Down to Earth All Vegetarian Organic & Natural
experience.summary: Delivered exceptional service in a natural foods retail setting. Supported wellness operations and maintained accuracy in receiving and stocking inventory.
responsibilities: Received 6–10 pallets daily and verified invoice accuracy.
Achieved 99% customer service rating from Secret Shopper evaluations.
Assisted customers with organic and wellness product inquiries.
Operated electric pallet jacks and maintained stockroom organization.

experience.summary: Oversaw frozen and dairy sections, ensuring freshness, accuracy, and efficiency. Managed inventory and led small teams to maintain department standards.
responsibilities: Managed milk and frozen sections with over 20 doors of product.
Received and unloaded 250+ crates weekly from Meadow Gold Dairy.
Ensured correct pricing and rotation for perishable goods.
Led 2–3 associates to maintain department efficiency.

experience.summary: Upheld store cleanliness and safety through consistent sanitation, sweeping, and upkeep of customer areas during peak retail hours.
responsibilities: Cleaned restrooms, floors, and high-traffic areas to maintain sanitation.
Disposed of waste and maintained safe, organized public spaces.
Completed daily cleaning tasks independently and efficiently.

projects.title: Shopify Desktop Admin
projects.description: Created a cross-platform desktop application using Electron and Vue.js to manage Shopify product data. Automated bulk uploads and streamlined variant updates, improving efficiency for e-commerce workflows.

projects.title: UPT Calculator App
projects.description: Developed a responsive progressive web app using React and Tailwind CSS to help Amazon associates track UPT accrual, usage, and scheduling. Implemented IndexedDB for offline use and data persistence.

education.notes: Completed coursework in computer systems, troubleshooting, and data organization with a focus on applying technology to real-world workplace processes.
